normal.speaker: Mary
normal.line: If my power is a compass, then I am a guide.

normal.speaker: Mary
normal.line: Are you feeling lost? I can offer comfort, if you wish.

normal.speaker: Mary
normal.line: The church taught me that even in darkness, there is a path to light.

normal.speaker: Mary
normal.line: We all carry our own burdens. Please, let me help lighten yours.

normal.speaker: Mary
normal.line: May your heart find peace in these trying times.

taunt.speaker: Mary
taunt.line: I don't wish to harm you, this is an atonement...

taunt.speaker: Mary
taunt.line: I offer this to you as a reconciliation...

taunt.speaker: Mary
taunt.line: Please accept this as my effort to compensate for your wrongs...

taunt.speaker: Mary
taunt.line: I will pray for your forgiveness... and for mine.
